name: Bibleknowledge

”Alexa, open bible knowledge”
”Alexa, start bible knowledge”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible knowledge
des:
Test your knowledge on bible related topics. See how you compare against other players. Multiple choice questions. Moderate skill level.
Help other people find our skill by rating Bible Knowledge in the Alexa Skill Store.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
